== UTF-8 in Ubuntu ==

Subsidiary tasks for the Hoary UTF-8 feature goal:

* Use UTF-8 locales by default in the installer
* Provide a tool for users to trivially switch existing systems to a UTF-8 locale (<nowiki>[[UTFEightMigrationTool]]</nowiki>)
* Hunt down and squash UTF-8 related bugs
